collection.name: col_person_qualifiers
collection.prototype:
select Q.id, QG.name||'.'||Q.name as name from qualifier Q join Qual_Group_Qualifier QG on QG.id=Q.group_qualifier join qual_group_qualifier_do QGDO on QGDO.group_qualifier = QG.id join qual_do_qualifier QDQ on QDQ.id=QGDO.domobject AND QDQ.domobject='cont_contact_person' join status st on Q.status=st.id and st.name='Active'
where 1=1 ::where-clause
